mapper.insert: insert into db_chinaexpressarea (SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', OPER, OPERTIME, BASEMONEY, BASEWEIGHT, UNITMONEY, UNITWEIGHT, DISCOUNT, OVERWEIGHT, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, DESCR) values (#{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{basemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{baseweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{unitweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{overweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR})
mapper.update: update db_chinaexpressarea set 'NAME' = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPER = #{oper,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OPERTIME = #{opertime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, BASEMONEY = #{basemoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, BASEWEIGHT = #{baseweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNITMONEY = #{unitmoney,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, UNITWEIGHT = #{unitweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, DISCOUNT = #{discount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, OVERWEIGHT = #{overweight,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, RESERVE1 = #{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE2 = #{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RESERVE3 = #{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DESCR = #{descr,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR} where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select: select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', OPER, OPERTIME, BASEMONEY, BASEWEIGHT, UNITMONEY, UNITWEIGHT, DISCOUNT, OVERWEIGHT, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, DESCR from db_chinaexpressarea where SEQUENCEID = #{sequenceid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select SEQUENCEID, 'NAME', OPER, OPERTIME, BASEMONEY, BASEWEIGHT, UNITMONEY, UNITWEIGHT, DISCOUNT, OVERWEIGHT, RESERVE1, RESERVE2, RESERVE3, DESCR from db_chinaexpressarea
